unfollowMessage: By clicking here, you'll unfollow the user
followMessage: By clicking here, you'll start following the user
cancelFriendRequest: Click to cancel the friend request
clickToShowManageOptions: Click to show management options and decide how to proceed
blockUserToPreventFriendRequest: Block this user to prevent future friend requests
friend_request_decision_modal_message: What action would you like to take with this friend request?
